# Atelier Katja

> Professional pastry chef's baking guides — perfect recipes with the science behind them.

Atelier Katja is created by Katja Althoff, an Austrian pastry chef living and working in the South of France. After training with top chefs, earning her professional pastry diploma, and building her own baking business, Katja creates detailed eBook guides that explain not just the steps of a recipe, but the *why* behind every technique.

Each guide is sold as an instant PDF download for $12 via Hotmart. A 15-day money-back guarantee is included on all products.

## Guides

- [The Art of Marble Cake](https://atelierkatja.com/the-art-of-marble-cake/): Step-by-step guide to the perfect moist marble cake, with a rich soaking syrup and a decadent Rocher chocolate glaze. Covers the recipe, techniques, and the science behind achieving a fluffy, moist result every time. $12.

- [The Art of Carrot Cake](https://atelierkatja.com/the-art-of-carrot-cake/): Complete guide to a perfectly moist carrot cake with light cream cheese frosting and marzipan carrot decorations. Includes step-by-step photos, the baking science, and storage/freezing tips. $12.

- [The Art of Cookies](https://atelierkatja.com/the-art-of-cookies/): Bakery-style cookie guide with 1 perfected base recipe and 8 flavor variations. Explains the full science of cookie baking — how butter, sugar, flour, and eggs interact to control texture, spread, and flavor. $12.

## Author

Katja Althoff is a professional pastry chef originally from Vienna, Austria, now based in the South of France. She holds a professional pastry diploma, has worked in demanding kitchens, and runs her own baking business. Her guides are designed for home bakers who want to understand the craft — not just follow instructions.
